title: 苦力怕爆炸破坏地形问题
author: 壹只蓝冰
txt_content:
如何使苦力怕在所有的世界都可以正常生成，爆炸，爆炸会造成伤害，但不破坏地形？
版本 1.12.2
基础插件 ESSX
多世界 MV

replies.author: 尊主
replies.txt_content: 在需要防止爆炸破坏地形的世界里  输入/gamerule mobGriefing ture

replies.author: Army_Master
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

ess配置里面
prevent:
    lava-flow: false
    water-flow: false
    water-bucket-flow: false
    fire-spread: true
    lava-fire-spread: true
    flint-fire: false
    lightning-fire-spread: true
    portal-creation: false
    tnt-explosion: true
    tnt-playerdamage: false
    tnt-minecart-explosion: true
    tnt-minecart-playerdamage: false
    fireball-explosion: true
    fireball-fire: false
    fireball-playerdamage: false
    witherskull-explosion: true
    witherskull-playerdamage: false
    wither-spawnexplosion: false
    wither-blockreplace: true
    creeper-explosion: false
    creeper-playerdamage: false
    creeper-blockdamage: true
    enderdragon-blockdamage: true
    enderman-pickup: false
    villager-death: false
把    creeper-blockdamage: true设为true 其他两个creeper相关的false就可以

replies.author: YUNHAIy
replies.txt_content: 应该是/gamerule mobGriefing false 吧

replies.author: 壹只蓝冰
replies.txt_content:

服务器安装即可
